title: Ride and Die
author: VD
content_html:
Another new track for Unauthorized subscribers. This is a mellow alternative mix.

How can I be lonely with the devil in my ear?
Seems he’s got the only voice I’m ever gonna hear.
How can I be losing with the devil at my side?
We’re just out and cruising on a midnight ride.

DISCUSS ON SG
